name: Sheet Music
description:
Sheet Music

Oops! Purple creature threatens the music world!

You're a magical warrior who can save the world.

You don't have to get it, but don't you want to help your cute musical instruments?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

 ←↑↓→, space, shift, X, C, V

And also, you can enjoy the setting with microphone recognition.

Mouse touch is impossible!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Preview

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy the play! I hope you have a fun time. :p

GG!
